channel.title: ebpf on Nicole van der Hoeven
channel.description: Recent content in ebpf on Nicole van der Hoeven

item.title: Observability Trends and Future Best Practices (k6 Office Hours #59)
item.description: What are some observability trends and best practices in 2022 and going forward? Technical Program Manager Daniel Gonz√°lez Lopes joins Developer Advocates Nicole van der Hoeven and Paul Balogh to chat about trending concepts and new areas of exploration in the field of observability. We’re going to talk about distributed tracing, continuous profiling, eBPF monitoring, and more!

item.title: How I Learn in Obsidian - Keeping up with tech trends
item.description: Here’s how I learn in Obsidian by processing articles I’ve read into consolidated notes that help me understand technical concepts. I also show how I improve my learning by incorporating visual elements using Obsidian Excalidraw, Excalibrain, and Advanced Slides.
